summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York regarding a draft letter to be filed with the court on April 19, 2021. It shows coordination among prosecutors on a government response to court orders in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email attaching a draft letter for filing with the court, working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Government Response Filing
events.description: Prosecutors prepared and filed a letter in response to court orders in the Epstein case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys regarding court filings in the Epstein case.
It shows prosecutors in the Southern District of New York coordinating on a government response to court orders.
The email was sent on April 19, 2021, regarding a letter to be filed that evening.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Epstein case as of April 2021.
